    • Method Detail

      • buildMessage

        public Message buildMessage(Event event)
        Description copied from interface: MessageBuilder
        Builds the message based from the given event. The message is used by the transport interface and is sent to other devices.
        Specified by:
        buildMessage in interface MessageBuilder
        Parameters:
        event - event to be converted into a message and sent to other devices
        Returns:
        ChordMessage equivalent of the Event

      • unpackEvent

        public Event unpackEvent(Message message)
        Description copied from interface: MessageBuilder
        Builds the event based from the given message. The event is applied by event handlers (which is either the built-in PPS event handler or your custom event handler, depending on the event type declared in the message) when the device receives it.
        Specified by:
        unpackEvent in interface MessageBuilder
        Parameters:
        message - message to be converted to an event after being received from any device
        Returns:
        Event equivalent of the message
